verses.verse: Praise Yahweh! You people who serve Yahweh, praise him! Praise him!
Everyone should praise Yahweh now and forever!
People who live in the east and people who live in the west, everyone, should praise Yahweh!
Yahweh rules over all the nations, and high in the heavens he shows that his glory is very great.
There is no one who is like Yahweh, our God, who lives in the highest heaven
and looks far down through the heavens and sees the people on the earth.
He lifts poor people up so that they no longer sit in the dirt; he lifts needy people up so that they no longer sit on heaps of ashes
and causes them to be honored by sitting next to leaders, leaders who rule his own people.
He also enables women who have no children to live in their houses as happy as mothers with children. Praise Yahweh!
